item.title: Org object model
item.description: The Okta org object model Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: - Update doc to include new features of an org and important missing attributes including: - Users and groups - Policies Links to original docs: - Okta Data Model: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/okta-data-model/ Structure type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview Conceptual overviews present a high-level introduction to a topic.

item.title: Policies
item.description: Policies Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Links to original docs: - What are policies: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/policies/ Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.Â For example, there are explanations \ deeper dives into single Okta features:

item.title: Okta Universal Directory (UD)
item.description: Okta Universal Directory (UD) Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: ‘- Title change Add summary content (and links) on how UD integrates with Hub and spoke Add summary content (and links) on how UD can be synced between other domains/systems/AD, etc Links to original docs: - User profiles: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/user-profiles/ Structure type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview
